## How To Work On Kaggle

1. Go to [https://www.kaggle.com/kernels](https://www.kaggle.com/kernels)
2. Make an account if you don't have one
3. Select `+ New Notebook`
<img src="img/create_notebook.png" alt="drawing" width="400"/>

4. Go to `File -> Import Notebook`
<img src="img/import_notebook.png" alt="drawing" width="400"/>

5. Upload this notebook

## How To Work On Kaggle

6. On the right-hand side of your Kaggle notebook, make sure:
  - `Internet` is enabled.
  
7. Follow the guidelines in the notebook

<img src="img/notebook_options2.png" alt="drawing" width="400"/>


## How To Add a Dataset

1. Click `+ Add Input` at the top right of the notebook.

2. Choose `Datasets` and search for the keyword (e.g. 'cat-breed-mardhik'). Several datasets will appear. Look for and 'Add' the dataset.

<img src="img/add_data1.png" alt="drawing" width="400"/>
<img src="img/add_data2.png" alt="drawing" width="400"/>
